ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | elab4g.1 | |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 2 |  | elab4g.2 | |- B = { x | ph } |
| 3 |  | #P_elex | |- ( A e. B -> A e. _V ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_elab2g | |- ( A e. _V -> ( A e. B <-> ps ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_biadan2 | |- ( A e. B <-> ( A e. _V /\ ps ) ) |
